00029 #ifndef _MEAS2_H_
00030 #define _MEAS2_H_
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 
00034 //tolua_begin
00035 class   meas2:  public  in1out {
00036   typedef       in1out  baseclass;
00037   
00038 public:
00039   meas2(){}
00040   ~meas2();
00041   int act(void);
00042   int getCTD(int i){return this->ctd_dist[i];}
00043   int getIAT(int i){return this->iat_dist[i];}
00044   dat_typ               inp_type;               // type of input data
00045   
00046   int           ctd_max;                // max cell transfer delay time
00047   int           iat_max;                // max inter arrival time
00048   unsigned      iat_overfl;             // overflow of IAT
00049   unsigned      ctd_overfl;             // overflow of CTD
00050   //tolua_end
00051   unsigned      *ctd_dist;              // CTDs 
00052   unsigned      *iat_dist;              // IATs 
00053 
00054   rec_typ       REC(data *, int);       // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00055   int   export(exp_typ *);
00056   
00057   tim_typ               last_time;
00058 }; //tolua_export
00059 
00060 
00061 #endif  // _MEAS2_H_
